original_text: This is what the Almighty Lord says: “You have forgotten me. You have not been faithful to me. You have lived as a prostitute and you have done disgusting things. So now you must receive the punishment that you deserve.” ’ This is what the Almighty Lord says: “You have forgotten me. You have not been faithful to me. You have lived as a prostitute and you have done disgusting things. So now you must receive the punishment that you deserve.” ’
korean_text: 그러므로 주 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하셨느니라 네가 나를 잊었고 또 나를 네 등 뒤에 버렸은즉 너는 네 음란과 네 음행의 죄를 담당할지니라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: This is what the Almighty Lord says:
You have not been faithful to me.
You have lived as a prostitute
and you have done disgusting things.
